trans-unit.source: Represents the resolution supported by a printer.
trans-unit.target: Representa la resolución admitida por una impresora.

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties to get the printer resolutions that are available on the printer and to set the printing resolution for a page, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase es utilizada por la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedades para obtener el tamaño de papel que están disponible en la impresora y para establecer la resolución de impresión de una página, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> property to determine whether the printer resolution type is the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> value <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom>.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> propiedad para determinar si el tipo de resolución de la impresora es el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> valor <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom>.

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> properties to determine the printer resolution in the horizontal and vertical directions, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Si es así, utilice la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> y <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> propiedades para determinar la resolución de la impresora en las direcciones horizontal y verticales, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de la impresión, consulte la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> información general del espacio de nombres.

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboPrintResolution` combo box with the supported resolutions.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se rellena el `comboPrintResolution` cuadro combinado con las resoluciones admitidas.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo supone que un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable denominada `printDoc` existe y que existe el cuadro combinado específico.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution" />.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> class.
trans-unit.target: En la siguiente tabla se muestran los valores iniciales de las propiedades de una instancia de la clase <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution>.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: Valor inicial

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer resolution.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la resolución de la impresora.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los valores de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind" />.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: El valor asignado no es un miembro de la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind" />.

trans-unit.source: This member overrides the <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro reemplaza el método <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains information about the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution" />.
trans-unit.target: Una <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contiene información sobre <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal printer resolution, in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la resolución horizontal de la impresora, en puntos por pulgada.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal printer resolution, in dots per inch, if <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom" />; otherwise, a <see langword="dmPrintQuality" /> value.
trans-unit.target: La resolución horizontal de la impresora, expresada en puntos por pulgada, si el valor de <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind" /> está establecido en <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom" />; de lo contrario, un valor de <see langword="dmPrintQuality" />.

trans-unit.source: `dmPrintQuality` is a member of the `DEVMODE` (device mode) structure, which defines constants that map to printer quality settings.
trans-unit.target: `dmPrintQuality` es un miembro de la `DEVMODE` estructura (modo de dispositivo), que define las constantes que se asignan a valores de calidad de la impresora.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> property contains the value `DMRES_HIGH` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.High>, `DMRES_MEDIUM` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Medium>, `DMRES_LOW` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Low>, and `DMRES_DRAFT` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Draft>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> propiedad contiene el valor `DMRES_HIGH` si <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.High>, `DMRES_MEDIUM` si <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Medium>, `DMRES_LOW` si <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Low>, y `DMRES_DRAFT` si <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> está establecido en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Draft>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `DEVMODE` structure, see the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre la `DEVMODE` estructura, vea MSDN Library en [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical printer resolution, in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la resolución vertical de la impresora, en puntos por pulgada.

trans-unit.source: The vertical printer resolution, in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: Resolución vertical de la impresora, en puntos por pulgada.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom>, the default value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> property is -1.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> propiedad no está establecida en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom>, el valor predeterminado de la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> propiedad es -1.
